Class MandelbrotTaskProvider

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.mathematics.mandelbrot.MandelbrotTaskProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
TaskProvider<MandelbrotTask, MandelbrotTask>
public class MandelbrotTaskProvider extends Object implements TaskProvider<MandelbrotTask, MandelbrotTask>
Provider for Mandelbrot tasks, supporting both Primitive (double) and Real (arbitrary precision) modes.

    • supportsGPU

      public boolean supportsGPU()
      Description copied from interface: TaskProvider
      Indicates whether GPU acceleration is supported.

      GPU support is typically available only for REAL mode tasks.

      Specified by:
      supportsGPU in interface TaskProvider<MandelbrotTask, MandelbrotTask>
      Returns:
      true if GPU is supported
